mapper.select: select b.no, title, content, hit, reg_date, user_no, name from users u, replyboard b where u.no = b.user_no order by b.no desc
mapper.insert: insert into replyboard values (seq_replyboard_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, 0, TO_DATE(#{date},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 1, seq_replyboard_no.currval, 1, 0)
mapper.update: update replyboard set order_no = order_no+1, depth = depth+1 where no = #{no}
